bibl.title: W.H.M. Liesker and P.J. Sijpesteijn, A Ptolemaic Papyrus from the Michigan Collection.
bibl.note: Probably a draft. Arsinoite nome (?), IInd cent. B.C. Lines 1-25 are dealing with calculations of pieces of land, lines 26-38 (written upside down) contain an account. - Excursus (pp. 26-28) on the method of calculating areas of quadrilaterals.
Bruins E.M., W.H.M. Liesker and P.J. Sijpesteijn, A Ptolemaic Papyrus from the Michigan Collection.
